info.title: Webhooks
info.description:
## Introduction
Explore our webhook payloads through this interactive documentation to explore real data from the account associated with your API token.
Note that these endpoints do not trigger any actual webhook events, they simply retrieve & display the expected payloads.

Refer to our main API documentation for information about managing & obtaining API tokens.

## Changelog

Changes to the webhook payloads will be documented below in reverse chronological order. Refer to the official release notes for the wider system updates.

#### 29th August 2024
- Updated order related webhooks to include new item types `fees`, `fulfilmentFees`, `giftVouchers`.
- Updated order related webhooks to detail the fee and tax breakdowns of each item.
- Updated order related webhooks to provide the total amount paid towards an order/reservation.

#### 9th March 2023
- Release of webhooks
